LanguageData.Milira.Difficulty_RelaxDesc: An almost effortless combat experience, suitable for players who want to enjoy the mod with ease.\n\nThreat points of milira faction raid multiplied by 20%.
LanguageData.Milira.Difficulty_EasyDesc: A relaxed combat experience, with milira and high-level milians rarely appearing in raids. Suitable for players who want to experience the mod but do not prefer combat content.\n\nThreat points of milira faction raid multiplied by 60%.
LanguageData.Milira.Difficulty_NormalDesc: A genuine combat experience, with raid-related content in this mod designed for this difficulty. Suitable for players who have a certain understanding of vanilla combat mechanics and prefer combat.
LanguageData.Milira.Difficulty_HardDesc: A challenging combat experience, suitable for players who can already handle milira raids proficiently and are ready to face greater challenges.\n\nThreat points of milira faction raid multiplied by 120%.
LanguageData.Milira.Difficulty_CrazyDesc: A survival-in-the-cracks combat experience, with milira and high-level milians may appear in earlier raids. Let's say goodbye to the future of your colony.\n\nThreat points of milira faction raid multiplied by 150%.
LanguageData.Milira.MilianModificationChance_OffDesc: Milian in raids do not have any modification components at all.
LanguageData.Milira.MilianModificationChance_SmallDes: Milian in raids have a small number of modification components. Each Milian's component slot has a probability of 0% (at 0 raid points) to 30% (at 10,000 raid points) to be equipped with a modification component as raid points increase.
LanguageData.Milira.MilianModificationChance_NormalDe: Milian in raids have a normal number of modification components. Each Milian's component slot has a probability of 0% (at 0 raid points) to 50% (at 10,000 raid points) to be equipped with a modification component as raid points increase.
LanguageData.Milira.MilianModificationChance_MoreDesc: Milian in raids have a large number of modification components. Each Milian's component slot has a probability of 0% (at 0 raid points) to 80% (at 10,000 raid points) to be equipped with a modification component as raid points increase.
LanguageData.Milira.MilianModificationChance_FullDesc: Milian in raids are fully equipped with modification components.
LanguageData.Milira.MilianTabEnable_Desc: choose the available way to open milian config tab.
LanguageData.MiliraRaceSetting_MilianClusterInMap_Des: Enable Milian clusters dropping in colony map.
LanguageData.MiliraRaceSetting_MilianSmallClusterInMa: Enable Milian outpost clusters dropping in colony map.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianHairColor_De: If enabled, Milian hair color will change as the faction's mechanoid accent color. Save reloading is required.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianHairColorOff: If enabled, Milian hair color will have a subtle shift based on the faction’s mechanoid accent color. Save reloading is required.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDrawHeadgear: If enabled, milian headgear will be rendered.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDisableWorks: If enabled, the initial work settings for the milian made in gestator are set to all work types disabled. Enabling this setting requires completing the "Milian Work Permissions" technology to take effect.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDifficulty_E:
If enabled, assaulting Mlian would improve quality of their equipment as player’s wealth increases.
 Good at 300,000 wealth.
 Excellent at 600,000 wealth.
 Master at 900,000 wealth.
 Legendary at 1,500,000 wealth.

If enabled, assaulting Milian would include elite pawn at a chance, the chance is increased as your current threat scale enlarges. 
 2% at 100% threat scale
 6% at 220% threat scale
 20% at 500% threat scale.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDifficulty_P: If enabled, assaulting Milian will have the ability of Promotion.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDifficulty_F: If enabled, assaulting Milian would take 40% lesser time to use Promotion.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDifficulty_W: If enabled, assaulting Milian would have an infinite range to receive Promotion.
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MilianDifficulty_C: If enabled, resonator could appear in Milian cluster.
If enabled, maximum points of Milira cluster would alter to 50,000 rather than previous 10,000. (mods that’ve removed the raid points limit shall be used)
LanguageData.MiliraRace_ModSetting_MiliraDifficulty_T: If enabled, assaulting Milira consumes no food nor rest needs when using Hyper-velocity Flight.
LanguageData.Milira.RaceRestrictedApparel_Desc: Toggle apparel restrictions to decide whether milira is allowed to wear apparels outside of the designated set.
